short_description: henderson building contractors is a construction services company based in cramlington, united kingdom.
long_description: our company has been involved in projects as a result of all recent large scale flooding incidents in the north east region of england. our expertise allows us to carry out escape of water/ oil contracts, working alongside specialist surveyors. offering services from investigation works through to full reinstatement of damage. henderson building contractors offer services ranging from initial emergency/temporary repairs to full fire reinstatement projects. we have experience in domestic, commercial and industrial properties. our fire damage services include stripping out, contents removal, thermal fogging, structural repairs, roofing, electrical, plumbing/heating, joinery, tiling, decoration and completion clean. we guarantee a professional service ensuring contracts are completed on time, within budget and to a high standard. "henderson building contractors have consistently provided us with a professional and comprehensive service in respect of all aspects of building development, repair and refurbishment to the satisfaction of ourselves and our clients.

generated_description: henderson building contractors, legally known as henderson building contractors limited, based in cramlington, northumberland, england, is a family-run building contracting service established in 1984. the company specializes in flood, fire, impact, and storm damage restoration, subsidence, wet and dry rot, and escape of water and oil. as an approved contractor to the insurance and loss adjusting industry, henderson building contractors works closely with insurance companies, loss adjusters, building surveyors, and structural engineers. the company offers a range of services including new builds, extensions, alterations, refurbishment, and maintenance works for both public and private sectors. henderson building contractors is a member of the federation of master builders and the safe contractor, ensuring all work is carried out to strict safety regulations and guidelines.
